name: zhaie's free VN assets [background]
description:
I will upload the others if I got my hands on my PC but as of now these are some of the samples of the photos I took before when I was travelling around.

The photos are taken using my DSLR sometimes my phone so the quality is incosistent ;w;

(Prolly) Gonna update this soon. Idk if these will be used but I thought it may help.

Idk abt the sizes if it is okay since I didn't double check OvO);

This is the forum thread: https://lemmasoft.renai.us/forums/viewtopic.php?f=...

I posted the other edited/cropped/resized/filtered photos there so I thought I should put the link here.

What you can find

  • Batangas (40 images) - garden photos
  • Davao/Compostella (8 images) - mostly resort photos
  • In my school (6 images) - not-so-school theme since there are more greeneries than buildings
  • Japan (33 images) - city, stores, temples, shrines, etc
  • Thailand (17 images) - conferences, city, etc
  • More soon: Village, Bataan, Mall, Churches, Cemetery, etc. [idk]

Just in case people might ask:

  • You may edit it.
  • If you're going to credit me use zhaie.yuemn or zhaie.chan or zhaie :)

Thankies much :D
